content:
The physical conference will take place at the University of Maryland, College Park, in the Edward St. John Learning and Teaching Center, on the first floor (not the ground floor). There will be signs at each entrance directing you. The main room is 1224. Parallel sessions will be held in 1224 and 1215. We have room 1309 as an extra viewing room where the talks in room 1224 will be streamed.

https://goo.gl/maps/RzZwQiqKZRiG4UfR8

Registration opens at 8.30am Monday 31 July, with the opening remarks at 9am. There will be coffee at registration.
